events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has identified this case as a refund request based on the user's message content.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item order.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I'll be happy to assist you with your refund today.
Could you please provide your order number and send a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Here is my order number 987654321 and attached is a photo showing the incorrect product that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate your quick help and the refund resolution. Thanks for sorting this out promptly.
The refund process has been completed successfully. Please allow a few days for the transaction to appear on your account.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and if there's anything else we can assist you with today.
Since your refund is complete and no further requests were made, we are closing this support case now. Thank you!
